question: Which of the following can be an external data source for a ServiceNow application?

options.B: Data provided by a public web service using SOAP or REST

question: Which one of the following is true for the Application Picker and Application Scope?

options.A: Global is a reserved application which does not appear in the Application Picker
options.B: Selecting an application from the Application Picker does not set the Application Scope
options.C: Selecting an application from the Application Picker sets the Application Scope
options.D: Selecting Global in the Application Picker sets the Application Scope to Incident

question: Which of the following is NOT a Flow Designer feature?

options.B: Call a flow from another flow or subflow

question: What is the purpose of the coalesce field when importing data?

options.A: If a match is not found, the existing record is updated
options.B: To determine if a record matches an existing record or is a new record
options.C: To identify and merge duplicate records
options.D: When a match is found, a new record is inserted

question: What is the Event Registry?

options.A: A Workflow which is launched every time an Event is generated; used to debug Events
options.B: The Event Log which lists all Events that have been generated
options.C: The method used in server side scripts to generate Events and pass parameters
options.D: A table containing a record for every Event known to the ServiceNow system which allows ServiceNow to react when Events are generated
